title: Hecarim type champions for top.
body: Hi all! Im looking for another champion(s) that are similar to Hecarim for top. What I mean is a champion that is versatile( a bruiser, a tanky damage dealer) and has high impact in a teamfight, like how HEc can dive straight into the backline. Any thoughts?

replies.body: Cept Irelia doesn't have as big an impact on teamfights as Hec does
Depends on the comps and the situation.
Unless they have lots of squishies and no peel
Wouldn't Irelia be better against 1 squishy 4 tanks then hecarim?
Cho'gath and Maokai could also be it.

Skarner; an equally spammable q, gets really tanky, his role in teamfights is usually to dive in a drag the enemy carry out and kill them.
I should mention that Skarner is far, far better as a jungler though.
